page.title: 04COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: { { } Because we live in a rural area there are a lot more lanes than main roads.These connect the farms and isolated settlements to villages.There are also quite a few footpaths which run through the fields. Many are clearly signposted.The only main road in the area is the A618 which runs in a N/S direction linking Whiston and Aughton/Aston/Swallownest and the A57.The most notable feature is the M1 motorway which runs right across the area in a straight line from East to West.The M1 cuts through fields raised up on embankments and through hillsides via cuttings.In the east of the area the M1 links with the M18 which runs eastwards towards Doncaster and the A1,M62,Hull and the east coast.
